```{r }
header.true <- function(df) {
  names(df) <- as.character(unlist(df[1,]))
  df[-1,]
}
```

na.test <-  function (x) {
  w <- sapply(x, function(x)all(is.na(x)))
  if (any(w)) {
    stop(paste("All NA in columns", paste(which(w), collapse=", ")))
  }
}
